memberdef.argsstring: (const cv::Mat &canvas, geo::Vec2 point1, geo::Vec2 point2, geo::Transform2 pose, float resolution, int origin_x, int origin_y, cv::Scalar colour)
memberdef.name: drawLine

briefdescription.para: drawLine, draw a line in 2D metric space on a canvas

parameterdescription.para: canvas to draw the line to
first point defining the line in map frame
second point defining the line in map frame
position of the sensor in map frame.
location in pixels of the sensor on the canvas

memberdef.argsstring: (EntityRepresentation2D entity, geo::Transform2 sensor_pose, geo::Transform2 entity_pose, geo::Transform2 fitted_pose, FitterData fitterdata, bool estimateEntityPose)
memberdef.name: visualizeFitting

detaileddescription.para: create an image displaying the fitted entity along with the information used in fitting.
Displays the fitted entity, sensor data used in fitting and the original pose of the entity prior to fitting.

Note that sensor_pose, entity_pose and fitted_pose must be expressed in the same coordinate frame
entity
shape of the entity that was fitted
sensor_pose
pose of the sensor
entity_pose
estimated pose of the entity prior to fitting
fitted_pose
estimated pose of the entity after fitting
fitterdata
fitterdata used in fitting the entity.
estimateEntityPose
whether or not the fitting encountered errors
